tooltips.assignedUser: The manager of the center (health, emergency operations or training center).
tooltips.users: The staff assigned to this branch. Needs to be a user in the system.
tooltips.name: Name of the center.
tooltips.branch: Branch to which the center belongs.
tooltips.nrStaff: The number of Mali Red Cross staff in the center.
tooltips.nrVolunteers: The number of Mali Red Cross volunteers in the center.
